data.title: Nuclear Blast Records
data.meta_description:
Nuclear Blast Records | 9,888 followers on LinkedIn. Music To Blast Your Head | Since its inception in 1987, Nuclear Blast  have signed and developed some of the most renowned, respected and influential artists in the world of extreme music.

With well-established artists like SLAYER, ROB ZOMBIE, SABATON, NIGHTWISH, IN FLAMES, OPETH, KREATOR, SEPULTURA, CRADLE OF FILTH, EPICA, DIMMU BORGIR, TESTAMENT, IMMORTAL, EXODUS, OVERKILL, MESHUGGAH, SOILWORK, and more, Nuclear Blast continue to be at the forefront of the extreme music genre.

Nuclear Blast's identity and impact on the marketplace is growing substantially and there is no stop to this rising force!
